title: Where would I go to report a player that haven't played with for doing things that aren't right.
body: So there is this one player that my friends and I have been dealing with, because he has friends in the circle, who posts nudes links in league of legends chats. I personally never experience it but everyone else has. I will not name his summoner name in case this is not the right place but where to I go to notify riot about his link posting in champion select and post game screen

replies.body: Eeeeeee that's no good!! Try to make use of the report feature in the after game lobby to report that player, or check in on the Player Behavior & Moderation board!
Okay thank you. I never experienced the in game but I have in discord. Everyone I know has though. I will check the moderation board thanks!
